input.sentences: with heavy hearts we marked where the funeral was being held .
the obituary was respectful and sobering .
all her family was gathered | sad but glad to be together in her memory .
there were many gorgeous flowers adorning her grave .
and a plaque commemorating her life .
output.sentences: In a small town in North Caroline, a tragedy happened.
They laid flowers at his grave.
And they had a lovely memorial service.
